## Remarks Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> events to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control. For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
